info.name: Furry+
info.description: This userstyle changes the original Google+ logo on G+.
info.additionalInfo:
Features
-------------------------
- Changes the G+ logo to a simple grey version with a paw print, or to Furry+ and a paw print.

F+ Paw print version 1.0 RC Changelog
-------------------------
Internal release.

Known Issues
-------------------------
- None so far.

Tested in
-------------------------
Chromium 17.0.929.0
